Name: The Legends of Tynedale
About the game: Story Legend has it there lies an evil, long forgotten secret in Tynedale. Journey with Geordie as he attempts to achieve what his grandfather could not: conquer complex dungeons, defeat epic bosses and uncover Tynedaleâ€™s darkest truth. Gameplay Retro-inspired top-down, action-adventure game. Explore the interconnected world of Tynedale. Discover mysteries and secrets to collect. Unlock and master powerful weapons and tools. Venture through increasingly challenging, puzzle-box and lock & key dungeons Harden your skills battling with monsters and defeating epic bosses. Come and join the friendly Discord community:
